header.title: Pro E-commerce Photos from Any Snapshot
header.subtitle: Instantly create photorealistic lifestyle images. Place your product into any custom scene you can describe.

photoStudio.step1: Upload one or more product photos.
photoStudio.step2: Describe the scene you want to place your product in.
photoStudio.step3: Click "Generate" on each photo to create a photorealistic lifestyle shot!

videoStudio.step1: Upload one product photo to serve as the starting image.
videoStudio.step2: Describe the animation or scene for your video.
videoStudio.step3: Click "Create Video" and the AI will generate a short, cinematic clip!
videoStudio.promptPlaceholder: e.g., A cinematic 360-degree rotation of the product...
videoStudio.durationTooltip: Set the desired length of the video clip.

idleState.title: Your generated video will appear here
idleState.subtitle: Upload an image and describe your scene to get started.

messages.started: Process started. This may take a few minutes...

errorState.title: Video Generation Failed
errorState.subtitle: There was an error creating your video. Please try again.

imageUploader.welcome: Phone photos welcome! We'll handle the magic.
imageUploader.magic: Release to add them to the studio!

atmosphereUploader.title: Add Ambiance Photos (Optional)
atmosphereUploader.description: Add photos of your restaurant's interior, tables, or decor. The AI will use them as inspiration to create a matching background.

controls.promptPlaceholder: e.g., on a marble countertop in a well-lit kitchen
controls.regeneratePromptsTooltip: Generate a new list of background ideas with AI
controls.aspectRatioTooltip: Changes the final shape of the image. 1:1 is a square, good for product listings and social media. 'Original' keeps the same shape as your uploaded photo.

emptyState.title: Your images will appear here
emptyState.subtitle: Upload your product photos to get started.

imagePreview.regenerateTooltip: Generate a new version of this image
imagePreview.colorCorrectTooltip: Automatically adjust colors, brightness, and contrast
imagePreview.retryColorCorrectTooltip: Error: {{error}}. Click to retry color correction.

error.title: Camera Error
error.noAccess: Camera access was denied. Please allow camera access in your browser settings to use this feature.
error.noDevice: No compatible camera device found on this system.
error.generic: Could not start the camera. It might be in use by another application.

error.noImage: No image was generated. The model might have refused the request.
error.upscaleFailed: Upscaling failed. The model did not return an image.
error.colorCorrectFailed: Color correction failed. The model did not return an image.
